Description: Fragment of neck and oval handle to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '241' Name Dorkylidas. From same die as an example in the French School at Athens.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (138)
